step_1.title: Sign up for free in few minutes!
step_1.description: Create your account in a few simple steps by providing some basic information such as your username.

step_2.title: Search and discover movies and TV series!
step_2.description: Search for a movie or a TV series you have watched or you want to watch in a 1M+ database.

step_3.title: Add them to your diaries!
step_3.description: Track every movie and TV series by adding them to your diaries. A diary is a list of movies or TV series representing a common fact, such as "watched movies".

step_4.title: Not convinced yet?
step_4.description: Try out a demo by logging in with an already registered user.

cinediary_info.description: Cinediary allows you to track movies and TV series.
